name: The Incredible Cannon Man
description:
Ladies and gentlemen, today at the most famous circus in town, our biggest attraction will be the incredible cannon man! But first he must rehearse his explosive moves, mustn't he?
Aim and shoot the cannon man with the mouse and EXPLODE everything to reach your destination!

Anonymous King: @anonymouskingoficial
Programmer: KingLucky 
Pixel art: Harley - @zonadepixels
illustration art: Henrique - @artuenric

How to play:
Aim-Use mouse to aim.
Shoot- Use left click to shoot
